title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, July 23, 2021
description: “Each one of you can change the world, for you are made of star stuff, and you are connected to the universe.” – Vera Rubin, American Astronomer. Born 1928.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “Each one of you can change the world, for you are made of star stuff, and you are connected to the universe.” – Vera Rubin, American Astronomer. Born 1928.
